dialogue-Abigail.CafeVisit: I've been waiting to eat today.
dialogue-Abigail.LastAteComment: I already miss the {0} I had at your restaurant the other day.#$b#I might visit again soon!$h
dialogue-Abigail.CafeOpened: I heard you're running a restaurant now.#$b#Usually it's either Mom's cooking or the Saloon for me.#$b#Not that those are bad or anything! Just good to add some variety.$h
dialogue-Generic.CafeVisit: $c 0.7#So what's the special today?#I felt like eating out today so I made my way over.#$b#Hmm... Maybe I'll get the [MonsoonSheep.MyCafe_GetRandomMenuItem].
dialogue-Generic.CafeVisit2: $query MonsoonSheep.MyCafe_IsIndoorCafe#It's nice in here.|It's nice out here.#$e#What's on the menu?#$b#I might try the [MonsoonSheep.MyCafe_GetRandomMenuItem] this time.
dialogue-Generic.CafeFirstTimeVisit: $c 0.7#I like what you've done with this place.#This place is pretty great!$h
dialogue-Generic.LastAteComment: I liked the {0} I had at your restaurant the other day.
